channel.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location

item.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:12, topic:339427”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=435814.msg3201072#msg3201072 date=1273339580]
Also, your problem was that you were checking if they typed the command ‘di’ and had the rights of membership as ‘0’ and in the second one you were only checking their rights as a member and not what command they typed, which is why your players kept getting sent there when typing something else.
[/quote]

Exactly.
A tricky thing to diagnose at first but it does cause a problem. There is a certain time you should evaluate more than one statement in the same if statement, this wasnt the case.[/quote]

Yup, since the String condition in the first if-statement wasn’t met in the second one it resulted in it not working properly.

Read full topic
item.source: Any tele teleports me to a certain location

item.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

The Soul:

Also, your problem was that you were checking if they typed the command ‘di’ and had the rights of membership as ‘0’ and in the second one you were only checking their rights as a member and not what command they typed, which is why your players kept getting sent there when typing something else.

Exactly.
A tricky thing to diagnose at first but it does cause a problem. There is a certain time you should evaluate more than one statement in the same if statement, this wasnt the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Also, your problem was that you were checking if they typed the command ‘di’ and had the rights of membership as ‘0’ and in the second one you were only checking their rights as a member and not what command they typed, which is why your players kept getting sent there when typing something else.

item.source: Any tele teleports me to a certain location

item.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:7, topic:339427”]Some people usually change it to equalsIgnoreCase(). One time I helped a guy and it was because he used startsWith(), I just dont remember what his problem was.

if (command.startsWith("di") && (playerIsMember == 0 ) ) { sendMessage("You are not a donator."); } else if (command.startsWith("di") && (playerIsMember == 1)) { teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; }

Try that.[/quote]

I find checking the same variable twice after it’s already been checked is redundant, but I guess you just didn’t catch it.

Read full topic
item.source: Any tele teleports me to a certain location

item.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:7, topic:339427”]Some people usually change it to equalsIgnoreCase(). One time I helped a guy and it was because he used startsWith(), I just dont remember what his problem was.

if (command.startsWith("di") && (playerIsMember == 0 ) ) { sendMessage("You are not a donator."); } else if (command.startsWith("di") && (playerIsMember == 1)) { teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; }

Try that.[/quote]

You’re just too pro. Thanks alot! would rep again if i could.

Read full topic

item.title: Any tele teleports me to a certain location
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

It teleports me to my donator zone. Here’s the code to my donator zone (command). if you need anything else, tell me!

if (command.startsWith("di") && (playerIsMember == 0 ) ) { sendMessage("You are not a donator."); } else if (playerIsMember == 1) { teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; }

Read full topic
